Auckland Police say investigation underway after on-duty officers filmed on stripper pole https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-police-say-investigation-underway-after-on-duty-officers-filmed-on-stripper-pole/XFHEEERTPFB2RNTBTCKK6NIPRA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-police-say-investigation-underway-after-on-duty-officers-filmed-on-stripper-pole/XFHEEERTPFB2RNTBTCKK6NIPRA/ 'There are very clear guidelines about what is acceptable behaviour.' Thu, 12 Dec 2024 06:16:43 +0000 Footage showed the police officers taking turns on the pole. Image / Supplied
Ngāti Northland: Ngāti Hine and Northland Regional Council make history with first iwi-council agreement https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/ngati-northland-ngati-hine-and-northland-regional-council-make-history-with-first-iwi-council-agreement/55X4XBG23JHCPGFNC7U763WZMI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/ngati-northland-ngati-hine-and-northland-regional-council-make-history-with-first-iwi-council-agreement/55X4XBG23JHCPGFNC7U763WZMI/ Ngāti Hine and NRC sign historic resource management agreement at Otiria Marae. Thu, 12 Dec 2024 06:07:47 +0000 Ngāti Hine deputy chair Pita Tipene signs the Mana Whakahono ā Rohe at today’s ceremony while NRC deputy chair Tui Shortland, left, looks on. Photo / Supplied

SH25: Truck trailer rolls at Pumpkin Hill in Coromandel https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/sh-25-truck-trailer-rolls-at-pumpkin-hill-in-coromandel/LGZMZSJS6ZHFPP5S2LHCOD5LCU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/sh-25-truck-trailer-rolls-at-pumpkin-hill-in-coromandel/LGZMZSJS6ZHFPP5S2LHCOD5LCU/ Emergency services responded to an incident shortly after 1.15pm.Thu, 12 Dec 2024 05:09:48 +0000 The incident was reported on State Highway 25 in the vicinity of Pumpkin Hill near Tairua.

Nurse who had relationship with father of baby she cared for has misconduct finding overturned https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nurse-who-had-relationship-with-father-of-baby-she-cared-for-has-misconduct-finding-overturned/UM5EQHKL2RAD3HKJKBZ76EZCLM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nurse-who-had-relationship-with-father-of-baby-she-cared-for-has-misconduct-finding-overturned/UM5EQHKL2RAD3HKJKBZ76EZCLM/ Ric StevensThe High Court has overturned the nurse's professional misconduct finding. Eke Panuku to go: Auckland councillors vote to abolish urban regeneration body, downsize Tātaki Auckland Unlimited https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/eke-panuku-to-go-auckland-councillors-vote-to-abolish-urban-regenesis-body-downsize-tataki-auckland-unlimited/GW633NAQ5ZCQ7PIQFZOFU5VQYY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/eke-panuku-to-go-auckland-councillors-vote-to-abolish-urban-regenesis-body-downsize-tataki-auckland-unlimited/GW633NAQ5ZCQ7PIQFZOFU5VQYY/ Bernard OrsmanAuckland Transport is the next CCO in Wayne Brown's sight.
